title: From the Tokyo Villain to the Love Game - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   School Life
tags: Academy   Game Elements   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Transmigration   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters
author: 金毛贝
description:
When Kiryu Ryuto travels through, he finds that his identity is actually the villain master in the love game.

Very coincidentally, he is carrying out a very promising job, kidnapping the heroine.

More coincidentally, the heroine’s bodyguards are coming here, ready to throw him into Tokyo Bay to be fed to the fish.

Wait, is this really the world of a love game? Why am I being thrown to feed the fish as soon as I crossed over?

The world is hot and cold, people’s hearts are sinister, and only many beautiful girls can make people feel a touch of warmth

– BY. Master of Death. Kiryu Ryuto>
